moves.name: Inferno
moves.description: The user attacks by engulfing the target in an intense fire. It leaves the target with a burn.

moves.name: Nasty Plot
moves.description: The user stimulates its brain by thinking bad thoughts. It sharply raises the user's Sp. Atk.

moves.name: Thunder Fang
moves.description: The user bites with electrified fangs. It may also make the target flinch or leave it with paralysis.

moves.name: Leer
moves.description: The opposing team gains an intimidating leer with sharp eyes. The opposing team's Defense stats are reduced.

moves.name: Ember
moves.description: The target is attacked with small flames. It may also leave the target with a burn.

moves.name: Howl
moves.description: The user howls loudly to raise its spirit, boosting its Attack stat.

moves.name: Smog
moves.description: The target is attacked with a discharge of filthy gases. It may also poison the target.

moves.name: Howl
moves.description: The user howls loudly to raise its spirit, boosting its Attack stat.

moves.name: Smog
moves.description: The target is attacked with a discharge of filthy gases. It may also poison the target.

moves.name: Roar
moves.description: The target is scared off and replaced by another Pokémon in its party. In the wild, the battle ends.

moves.name: Bite
moves.description: The target is bitten with viciously sharp fangs. It may make the target flinch.

moves.name: Odor Sleuth
moves.description: Enables a Ghost-type target to be hit with Normal- and Fighting-type attacks. It also enables an evasive target to be hit.

moves.name: Beat Up
moves.description: The user gets all party Pokémon to attack the target. The more party Pokémon, the greater the number of attacks.

moves.name: Fire Fang
moves.description: The user bites with flame-cloaked fangs. It may also make the target flinch or leave it burned.

moves.name: Feint Attack
moves.description: The user approaches the target disarmingly, then throws a sucker punch. It hits without fail.

moves.name: Embargo
moves.description: It prevents the target from using its held item. Its Trainer is also prevented from using items on it.

moves.name: Foul Play
moves.description: The user turns the target's power against it. The higher the target's Attack stat, the greater the damage.

moves.name: Flamethrower
moves.description: The target is scorched with an intense blast of fire. It may also leave the target with a burn.

moves.name: Crunch
moves.description: The user crunches up the target with sharp fangs. It may also lower the target's Defense stat.

moves.name: Nasty Plot
moves.description: The user stimulates its brain by thinking bad thoughts. It sharply raises the user's Sp. Atk.

moves.name: Inferno
moves.description: The user attacks by engulfing the target in an intense fire. It leaves the target with a burn.
